title: WEATHER: Landslide early warnings for eight districts
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Landslide early warnings have been issued for 8 districts with effect from 10:30 AM on Tuesday (30).
The districts are Colombo, Galle, Kalutara, Kandy, Kegalle, Matara, Nuwara Eliya, and Ratnapura.
General Shavendra Silva – The new Chief of the Defence Staff.
WEATHER: Wind speeds up to 50 kmph / 100 mm rainfall expected
